fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a sound or picture is fuzzy, it is unclear
fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Some of the photos were so fuzzy it was hard to tell who was who.
fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: There’s a fuzzy line between parents’ and schools’ responsibilities.
fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: covered with soft short hair or fur
fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I stroked the kitten’s fuzzy back.
fuzzy.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: fuzzy hair is very curly and sticks straight up
